g.text: The tone of the email should be changed and rewritten in a more professional manner.

text.font-family: Tsukushi A Round Gothic Regular,Tsukushi A Round Gothic Regular_MSFontService,sans-serif
Tsukushi A Round Gothic Regular,Tsukushi A Round Gothic Regular_MSFontService,sans-serif

g.text: I hope all is well. I am writing to request a day off on [date]. I have already taken care of my work

text.font-family: Tsukushi A Round Gothic Regular,Tsukushi A Round Gothic Regular_MSFontService,sans-serif

g.text: responsibilities for that day and will be available to answer any questions or concerns you may have.
